item.title: Why Scam Centers in Southeast Asia Keep Flourishing
item.description: A China-led crackdown on online fraud rescued thousands from Myanmar this month. But this massive business of grift keeps growing.

item.title: Gene Hackman: 5 Memorable Performances to Stream
item.description: He played a complicated hero in “The French Connection” and an arch-villain in “Superman.” Here are some of Hackman’s career highlights.

item.title: Austrian Parties Reach Deal to Form Government Without Far Right
item.description: The announcement was a victory for mainstream political parties, after earlier talks involving the hard-right Freedom Party broke down.
